name: Hello and Goodbye (Xiaoshanhuang)
description:
Artist: Floria Huang, Julie Kim.

Instructions: 

Arrow keys to control the characters. Mouse click to interact with the space.

Hello and Goodbye is an interactive animation. It is about the ability to say hello and goodbye to our loved ones. We wanted an interaction where the player can reminisce about their loved ones. It is designed in an organized structure therefore the players can smoothly embrace the story by taking the time machine.
